titleStmt.title: A thunder-clap to Sion-Colledge. Or, a catalogicall hint of the pulpit inveteracy, and apostacy, of that mischievous assembly, or mystery of iniquity, at Sion Colledge. By S.T: a cordiall friend to truth and peace, &c.
titleStmt.author: S. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G.W. near the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
